Package view

Class StoreOrderController

java.lang.Object
view.StoreOrderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class StoreOrderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
StoreOrderController handles inputs from the store orders GUI and defines all actions and helper methods relating to events triggered by the GUI such as exporting store orders and removing an order from store orders
